TopicTitle: How do I not have ksp close when I click on to my second monitor?

Articles.Content: I have 2 monitors, but when I click off of my ksp it closes. I know in steam you can do "-popupwindow" in steam, but I have ksp installs that aren't on steam. How do I "-popupwindow" a ksp that isn't connected to steam?

If you use CKAN to launch, you can modify your command line arguments:

CKAN > Settings > Game command-line

KSP_x64.exe -single-instance -popupwindow

I was experiencing the exact same issue as you described, and this fixed it for me.
